description: This file defines the UserMapper class responsible for converting between User data transfer objects (DTOs) and UserEntity objects, utilizing Spring's BeanUtils and a nested BankAccountMapper for handling bank account data.

classes.name: UserMapper
classes.description: A class for mapping User DTOs to UserEntity objects and vice versa, extending the BaseMapper class.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a User DTO into a UserEntity object, copying relevant properties and mapping bank accounts.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a UserEntity into a User DTO, copying properties and mapping bank accounts back.
